attributes.action: keep Mephedrone legal but tightly controlled as a Category D substance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mephedrone has not caused one death and is used by 40% of all clubbers each weekend.  Its effects include empathy with others.  Its a love drug and less harmful than alcohol in its effects.  We call on the PM to create a new category of drugs whereby Mephedrone would be legal but restricted to over 18s and in small does
